body.name: GUND Baby Sustainable Baby Doll, Plush Doll Made from Recycled Materials, for Babies and Newborns, Yellow, 12”

features: 100% RECYCLED PLUSH BABY DOLL: This 12” plush doll is crafted from recycled materials, including the stuffing in its playfully plump-yet-floppy body. Camellia has a soft marigold-yellow floral-pattern onesie and a matching hat with teddy bear ears.

HIGH-QUALITY, SAFE MATERIALS: Every Baby GUND plush doll is designed with the highest safety standards for baby toys, including bean-free bodies and embroidered details that ensure safe play for all ages. Each doll ships in a recycled poly bag.

BABY SHOWER GIFTS: Baby GUND plush and sensory toys make the perfect gifts for new parents and baby showers, as well as beautiful nursery decor. Whether it’s for a first birthday, holiday gift, or just because, gift a lifetime of hugs with a GUND.

QUALITY CUDDLES: Our award-winning stuffed animals and toys appeal to animal lovers everywhere, known for unmatched quality and huggable plush designs. From toddler toys to adults of all ages, GUND toys are perfect for play, collecting and cuddling.

PREMIER PLUSH: As one of America’s oldest teddy bear makers, GUND has crafted unique and classic stuffed animals and soft toys for 125 years. Today, we proudly carry this legacy and stand by our toys, known worldwide for their quality and innovation.
Includes: 1 Baby GUND 12” 100% Recycled Plush Doll, Poly Bag
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
body.description: Baby GUND is proud to introduce our first line of sustainably soft friends and plush dolls, sourced from 100% recycled materials! It’s our gift to future generations of cuddlers. This beautiful, diverse collection of 12” dolls is a great way to make imaginative doll play cuddly and fun! Each doll is crafted consciously with care, all-around softness, and a floral-patterned onesie outfit in an array of modern colors. They feature huggable and perfectly plump, playfully floppy bodies and hands crafted for little ones to hold easily, which makes them perfect partners for on-the-go play. Each doll features embroidered facial details and is perfect for all ages, newborns and up. Every component of the doll is crafted with recycled materials, including the fiber fill, recycled thread, and fabrics. Doll play is highly encouraged for children of all ages, often acting as Baby’s First Friend as well as great gifts for imaginative older kids to nurture, cuddle, and care for. Help spread our message of hugs today for a better tomorrow. This stuffed baby doll is appropriate for ages 0 and up. Like all Baby GUND (non-animated) plush toys, our baby dolls are machine-washable for easy, convenient cleaning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Meet Camellia! Since 1898, GUND has been recognized worldwide as a leader in plush. Building upon our unique designs, we continue to develop quality, innovative products to appeal to the next generation of customers. Each of our plush toys is constructed from premium materials for unparalleled softness and huggability that lasts through the years. To this day, we uphold a proud legacy of creating unique toys that inspire the kind of love, tenderness and warmth that children and their families cherish. 100% Recycled Plush Doll, 12" This beautiful, diverse collection of 12” dolls is a great way to make imaginative doll play cuddly and fun! Each doll is crafted consciously with care, all-around softness, and a floral-patterned onesie outfit in an array of modern colors. They feature huggable and perfectly plump, playfully floppy bodies and hands crafted for little ones to hold easily, which makes them perfect partners for on-the-go play. Each features embroidered facial details and is perfect for all ages, newborns and up. Every component of the doll is crafted with recycled materials, including the fiber fill, recycled thread, and fabrics. Doll play is highly encouraged for children of all ages, often acting as Baby’s First Friend as well as great gifts for imaginative older kids to nurture, cuddle, and care for.

About the Baby GUND 100% Recycled Plush Collection Cute, Whimsical & Cuddly Baby GUND is proud to introduce our first line of sustainably soft friends and plush dolls, sourced from 100% recycled materials! It’s our gift to future generations of cuddlers. What do we mean by “100% Recycled”? This innovative new plush collection is crafted only with sustainable materials - including the soft fabrics, fiber, fill and threading. Same Exceptional Baby GUND Quality Each cuddly recycled pal is crafted with the same premium, irresistibly huggable softness we're known for at GUND. Our plush stays soft through the years, even after countless playtime adventures.

How it Works 1. Recycled materials are sourced and sorted for repurposing. 2. Plastic bottles are washed and melted, transforming the plastic waste into super-fine fibers. 3. These new recycled fibers are then spun and used to craft plush friends!

Spin Master Playsponsible Spin Master is proud to present Playsponsible, a sustainability initiative that aims to deliver the joy of play to children and families responsibly and preserve future generations of fun. GUND is proud to support this project with our first line of sustainably soft friends! Plush on a Mission Every component of each stuffed animal is crafted with recycled materials, from the fiber fill and recycled thread to the soft fabrics. Explore the rest of the Baby GUND 100% Recycled Plush collection for sustainably made, sweet and soft plush animals that all support the mission of providing future generations with cuddly first friends. Winner of the 2023 Toy Insider Top Summer Toys Award Roise the Bunny, Clove the Bear, and Bay the Puppy 100% recycled plush were all awarded the 2023 Toy Insider Top Summer Toys Award! As featured in The Toy Insider’s 2023 Spring & Summer Gift Guide: “Get ready for fun in the sun! Chosen by experts, theses are the hottest toys and games that will keep kids busy all summer long. From travel-friendly toys to take with you on your next family adventure to playthings to get everyone up and active, this list has it all!”
Aster Daphnie Camellia Hibiscus Leilani Rosabella Outfit Color Blue Green Yellow Poppy Purple Pink

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gund baby doll
reviews.reviewText: It’s very cute and soft. Can’t wait to give it to my granddaughter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves her baby. Perfect for little hands to hold, hug and lay on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for young children
reviews.reviewText: It is a very soft ! No hard eyeballs or buttons, etc. attached. Perfect for young children. Very pleased. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little doll for a toddler
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for a 1- year- old and older toddler. Very soft. There are no parts that could be ripped off and swallowed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice basic doll with no hard parts or choking hazards
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the green (Daphne) and pink (Rosabella) dolls, and my 3-year-old loves them. They’re of decent quality and have only embroidered facial features, making them good and safe for napping (no hard parts or choking hazards). My one complaint is that the doll pills very quickly (as imaged). I washed the doll once, and the pilling seemed to get much worse ever since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft cuddly doll.
reviews.reviewText: Have purchased GUND products for years.And these dolls were same high quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for a 2 year old and she loves it
